newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures slip in bearish sentiment.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures slip in bearish sentiment.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended lower after lacklustre trade on Tuesday, as technical-driven selling dented prices following bearish sentiment from Monday, traders said.
Prices ranged from 2.2 yen to 3.5 yen per kg lower. Benchmark January was down 2.8 yen at 120.1 yen.
"After price gains last week amid a lack of fundamentally bullish factors, caution that prices were too high continued to stimulate sporadic long-liquidation," one trader said.
Weaker prices in producing countries on slow physical demand also dampened sentiment here, they said.
